alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 4:23PM EDT until May 06 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... West central Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 423 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Greensboro, or 15 miles east of Blountstown, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Midway, Havana, Quincy, Tallahassee, Telogia, Lake Talquin, Hosford, Scotland, Gibson, Fort Braden, Tallahassee Coml Airport, Shady Rest, Lowry, Wetumpka and Bloxham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida.
